headline: QXO, Inc. (QXO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on QXO, Inc. on Kairos Research’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on QXO. QXO, Inc.’s share was trading at $23.24 as of January 28th. QXO’s trailing and forward P/E were 2.11 and 66.67 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. QXO, Inc. distributes roofing, waterproofing, and other building products […]
